content.rendered:
The Fifth Canadian Chopin Piano Competition will take place from August 23 – 29, 2019 at The Royal Conservatory in Toronto.  Preliminary rounds will be held in Mazzoleni Hall, with Finals of both Junior and Senior divisions in Koerner Hall.

The Canadian Chopin Society is committed to providing a memorable experience for all competitors, with unique opportunities to deepen their understanding of the music of Chopin.

All competitors receive Festival passes, allowing them to attend all workshops, masterclasses, and events.

The top three prizes of the Senior Division include application fees, airfare and accommodation to participate in the Preliminary Round of the 18thInternational Fryderyk Chopin Piano Competition in Warsaw, Poland, pending acceptance. They may also be eligible for a simplified qualification process for acceptance into the Preliminary Round of the 18thInternational Fryderyk Chopin Piano Competition.

For more information, please see Repertoire Requirements and Rules and Regulations.
